db:abstract.db:para: Describes the use and license of the qtmain helper library.

db:article.db:para: qtmain is a helper library that enables the developer to write a cross-platform main() function on Windows. If you do not use qmake or other build tools such as CMake, then you need to link against the qtmain library.
